abstract: Bank of America will see if a new name, U.S. Trust, Bank of America Private Wealth Management, can burnish its private bank’s reputation in catering to the very rich.
snippet: Bank of America will see if a new name, U.S. Trust, Bank of America Private Wealth Management, can burnish its private bank’s reputation in catering to the very rich.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America built its brand as a financial supermarket that could be all things to all people. Now, it will see if a new name can burnish its private bank's reputation in catering to the very rich.

headline.main: Retail Giant Will Remake Private Bank
headline.print_headline: Retail Giant Will Remake Private Bank

abstract: The Bank of America built its brand as a financial supermarket that could be all things to all people. Now, it will see if a new name can burnish its private bank’s reputation in catering to the very rich.
